snippet.title: Super Bunny longplay (Apple II - Datamost)
snippet.description:
Super Bunny (http://www.mobygames.com/game/super-bunny) was an action game published by Datamost in 1983 for the Apple ][. The player controls a rabbit, which after eating a carrot, will turn into super bunny, giving it power to destroy monsters. The game requires really good timing and coordination, as you can tell in the video ;)

PS: The # of lives is stored at memory address 0x0BE2. I modified the game so that I got infinite lives for the longplay.

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
